name: pharma-collect-api-swagger-file
description: This file index all routes necessary for Pharma-collect app. Here is the list of available web-services as well as the parameters necessary for their proper functioning.   Be careful :   1) Query parameters must be sent in JSON format   2) You must respect the syntax of the parameters to be sent to the server   3) Mandatory parameters will be noted with '*'   4) You need to add a header with Key : 'Host' and Value : 'node'   5) All routes follow the format : {{URL}}/api/category_name/route_name
